Steps: Cook meat onions and peppers until tender
Chili setting for 18-20 minutes. Quick release
Notes: Can replace Fire R. tomatoes with 28oz crushed
Place all ingredients in order EXCEPT butter, cream and 1 teaspoon of garam masala
Mix well, then place chicken on top.
Close IP, set on high 10 min, then 10min natural release
Open up IP, set aside chicken
Add 4 oz butter, 4 oz cream, 0.5 bunch cilantro
Add chicken back and break it up.
